dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S694 IS: Apple Red Tape Elimination Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Gillibrand introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To remove the authority of the Agricultural Marketing Service to inspect apples.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Apple Red Tape Elimination Act of 2013.

section.header: Removal of AMS inspection authority over apples
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the Secretary of Agriculture, acting through the Agricultural Marketing Service, shall have no authority to inspect apples prior to export.
